centandmys:CobraStance.NAME: Cobra Stance
DESCRIPTION: Whenever you apply a debuff, apply one more stack of it. Upon entering this stance, apply #b5 #yVenom to ALL enemies.

centandmys:PythonStance.NAME: Python Stance
DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain #yBlock or #Temporary #yHP, gain one more of it. Upon entering this stance, draw #b1 card.
